skillTree.name: Gouge-Tusks
skillTree.description: The Beastman's tusks are drenched in gore - blood and sinew from every foul battle.

skillTree.name: Gnarled Hide
skillTree.description: Fur-clad, matted with offal and detritus, their weathered hides are a foul carapace.

skillTree.name: Uncanny Senses
skillTree.description: He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.

skillTree.name: Shadow Hide
skillTree.description: Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Primal Instincts
skillTree.description: The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Thirst
skillTree.description: It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Call to Morrslieb
skillTree.description: The weird, evil moon hangs low in the sky, drawing reverence from its abominable worshippers.

skillTree.name: The Strength of the Land
skillTree.description: The warherd waits, allowing the enemy to come to them. Nature is their defence, as man will soon find out.

skillTree.name: The Unrelenting Warherd
skillTree.description: The warherd charges out, slathering jaws and bellowing in fury. Against the charge, none can stand.

skillTree.name: The Best of the Beast
skillTree.description: A strong leader can bend the will of the warherd to his own, and reap the benefits of it.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: The Vast, Unending Warherd
skillTree.description: The warherd, though vast and hard to control, can be relied on to fight, fight, fight!

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror for Minotaurs units

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_training}}
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 5
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 10
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_spread_public_order}}
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional -1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional -2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional -3

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assault_garrison}}
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assassinate}}
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assault_units}}
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Booze Cravings
skillTree.description: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.

skillTree.name: Khorne's Fury
skillTree.description: More than mere bloodlust, this one is filled with the primal, Ruinous rage of the Lord of Battle.

skillTree.name: Nurgle's Foul Stink
skillTree.description: This one has something of the compost heap about themâ€¦

skillTree.name: Unsated Bloodthirst
skillTree.description: Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
